name: lizjones
text: Almost seven.

name: fermatprime
text: Oh man thank you , I've seen this strip almost five times and never noticed that before.

name: skavid
text: Almost five.

name: satyr
text: Yes, that and Beef's I recall... does it for me.

name: deimosrising
text: The best thing, for me, is that Ray is such a fucking player that women are desperate to hook up with him based on a weirdass Internet personal. Them's skilz.

name: snowman
text: Man, also, that cigarette smoke is gorgeous .

name: evilbobikus
text: I agree, it makes Beef look like one of those detectives you see in old detective movies, all self narrated with a new yorker or cockney accent.

name: ted0phile
text: I think the word you're groping for is noir .

name: tekende
text: Not really even groping. More like clumsily fumbling in the dark and then accidentally feeling up yourself instead of the girl.

name: jamers
text: A comment left by jamers was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, straw, hellofyellin, riotdejaneiro, kylank, Paco, fancypants, Elliott, drycup, luckypyjamas, idsyen, Fcannon, Wulvaine, yingkaixing)

name: flynn
text: Obviously you have not read the GOF.

name: jamers
text: Alas, I had not considered that when I penned the above remark. In any case, Beef is way cooler than me, so it's moot.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: The Roomba saga begins.

name: laikalost
text: Dear god, there's a "Roomba saga?"

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zem, sleepyhead, giantants)

name: the_doz
text: ROOOOOOOOOOMMMMBAAAAAAAAAAAA

name: ortsac
text: fantastic avatar/comment symbiotism going on here.

name: karljw
text: fantastic aphex twin avatar going on here.

name: internnumber1
text: Man, look at Roast Beef. Looking like he's about to spill secrets to the Washington Post.

name: endoftheworld
text: uh hello, Mr. Woodward? G. Gordon Liddy is breaking into the Whole Foods and messing with the organic produce I mean if that is a thing

name: albatross
text: Joy!  Soon there will be roomba theater.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Roast Beef all smoking in the dark, planning this, the biggest of jobs.

name: philosophe
text: Ache noir.

name: evolume
text:
i was gonna say...

i'll chubby you instead.

name: hendetta
text: A comment left by hendetta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, kylank, Shinkicka)

name: dovey
text: KSSSSSSSSHHH

name: raychurr
text: Beef noir is a beef best, in my opinion.

name: ibetso
text: Ray knows exactly what buttons to press with Beef. How many people would be persuaded to do something hella risky to get a vacuum?

name: bixschmix
text:
Wait. Hold the phone.

Roomba ain't just a vacuum, boy. You best reexamine your assumptions before you speak from here on out.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Seconded.

The day my father bought a Roomba was the day he stopped loving me.

name: coolbreeze3
text: No matter what the risk it is always worth it if there is a robotic vacuum to be had in the end.

name: natashamarie
text: "almost seven puerto rican chicks" is one of those achewood phrases that often pops into my head for no apparent reason... that and "about a pound"

name: rowboat
text: I think the seventh is beating down the door as he speaks, all Nicholson-style.

name: tim_simmons
text: all breaking the door with a bottle of the wine and sticking her head through it like 'eyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy papi!' or something

name: wulvaine
text: The Shining has never been more frightening.

name: falseprophet
text: Beef's code says the deal is not sealed until the cherry is cold.

name: beansdooma
text:
'did you provoke them'

Beef's seen this kind of thing before.

name: stormagnet
text:
Bonus points if he dresses them up like a DRD.

[IMGS OFF]

name: heccibiggs
text: Okay so in the UK we don't have Roomba (I swear to God like half of my comments mention the fact that I'm British), but I followed the link in the alt text and HOLY FUCKING JESUS IT'S THE COOLEST THING I'VE EVER SEEN. I want one so much. I don't even care about vacuuming or anything but it's so cool, I have to have one, it's amazing. And it's so cute. Oh God. How can I make this happen.

name: woodenteeth
text:
24 easy payments of...

A CHILD'S SOUL!

Let me know how you go with that.

name: snowman
text: Chubbied for use of period at the end instead of question mark.  I know that was intentional.

name: heccibiggs
text: Heehee, that's true, it was. It means a lot to me that you got that.

name: snowman
text: I know, it's weird how something like that just seems right sometimes.

name: rheabird13
text: oh gosh did you see the iRobot Looj? it is so practical and also extraordinarily fun to say. i need so bad it hurts my guts.

name: greenkoolayd
text: ill mail you one.

name: inthewater
text: Ray putting his cigarette out at the end totally makes this strip.

name: expellens
text: You mean Beef, not Ray.  Ray's got a (tiny) martini and a cordless phone to his ear.

name: mangecoeur
text: The last two panels are pure genius

name: mercurcia
text: The sound of Ray's cigarette extinguished in panel 7 makes it.
